occupation: Startup Founder at Georgia Tech CREATE-X
headline: CS @ Georgia Tech | Ex-Data intern @ KPMG, Slalom
summary:
👨‍💻 Steven Zhang | Computer Science Undergraduate at Georgia Tech | Data Scientist

🌟 Passionate about Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Innovative Software Solutions | Currently Exploring Large Language Models & Flutter Development

💼 Open to Networking with Industry Professionals & Like-minded Peers about Tech!

experiences.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant - Data 2 Insights Lab
experiences.description: - Conducted in-depth research under Prof. Kexin Rong to explore data cleaning task transferability across machine learning settings, utilizing Python, scikit-learn, pandas, and plot.ly, focusing on assessing the effectiveness of various techniques.\n- Designed and implemented 3 experiments to rigorously test hypotheses on data cleaning task transferability across different machine learning contexts.

experiences.title: Data Science Intern
experiences.description:
- Developed and implemented regression and classification models using Python (Scikit-learn, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib) to automate audit examinations for a government healthcare client, ensuring model transparency and providing clear, understandable explanations of risk assessments.
- Enhanced audit risk forecasting through advanced Bayesian statistics experiments, including Monte Carlo Markov Chains, achieving an 8% increase in predictive accuracy (R-squared from 0.69 to 0.77).
- Designed and engineered an innovative automated data pipeline dashboard using Python and DASH, significantly reducing the Quality Assurance Team's manual workload through streaming data processing and real-time analytics.
- Implemented advanced async callback functions to enhance interactivity in dashboard development, improving data presentation and analysis.
- Led the integration of key dashboard features, including file uploads, interactive checklists, and real-time status monitoring, dramatically improving automation, usability, and productivity.
- Utilized a rigorous code refactoring process to ensure adherence to object-oriented standards and swiftly integrated PR (Pull Request) feedback, significantly elevating code quality and maintainability.
experiences.location: Tysons Corner, Virginia, United States \u00b7 On-site

experiences.title: Data Engineer Intern
experiences.description:
- Developed a Python, PySpark, pandas, AWS Glue, and AWS Athena schema inference service to automate data type recommendations, boosting productivity for software engineers and data scientists.
- Initiated discussions with UI/UX and API teams to integrate schema inference into the client's Data Lake, streamlining data handling for over 1500 production datasets.
- Designed and developed a dataset test case generator, elevating Schema Inference test coverage to meet rigorous standards.
- Implemented Agile methodologies, facilitating the smooth execution of project workflows, and adeptly delivered compelling presentations to clients while efficiently incorporating their feedback.
- Authored detailed documentation and diagrams on Confluence, ensuring comprehensive project documentation for future reference and clarity.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Extern
experiences.description: - Led brainstorming sessions within a team to propose innovative POC solutions aimed at enhancing engagement in Virtual Learning Environments.\n- Created a PoC ML Tutor using TensorFlows Artificial Neural Networks to predict student grades from study-time and attendance data, effectively measuring engagement in virtual learning.\n- Collaborated in teams to present POC solutions, informing over 5 Cisco Senior Engineers about Virtual Learning Environment opportunities.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description: - Developed a social network platform with HTML, CSS, Vue.js, PHP, and PostgreSQL to connect 15+ local minority businesses in Georgia, fostering collaboration and talent acquisition.\n- Created a dynamic Profile-page within the platform to manage profile data, posts, reactions, and contact information for local businesses.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description:
Engineered Python-based IoT devices for air and water quality monitoring using Arduino Microcontrollers, contributing significantly to the Trichy, India Smart City initiative.
- Designed precise circuit diagrams for IoT devices, a cornerstone in the Smart City initiatives success.
 Developed C++ functions in Arduino IDE to enable real-time data collection for various environmental parameters, including Air Temp, CO PPM, Water Temp, and Turbidity.
 Developed a Flutter PoC app for location data, contributing to the Smart City Transit initiative.
 Collaborated with cross-functional teams to conceptualize and present innovative Smart City proposals to VDart Inc. CEO, demonstrating problem-solving acumen and teamwork.

accomplishment_projects.title: Flutter-Firebase Flash Chat Messaging
accomplishment_projects.description: Developed an instant messaging app, utilizing Flutter for an intuitive front-end and Firebase for backend functionalities, including user authentication and real-time message handling.

accomplishment_projects.title: Graph Neural Network for Social Network Analysis
accomplishment_projects.description: Developed a GNN model with PyTorch Geometric to identify key political groups in social networks, achieving a 12% improvement in accuracy over Spectral Clustering.
